field.name: FNSOF
field.description: Frame number of the received SOF

register.name: FS_DIEPMSK
register.description: OTG_FS device IN endpoint common interrupt mask register (OTG_FS_DIEPMSK)

field.name: INEPNMM
field.description: IN token received with EP mismatch mask

field.name: ITTXFEMSK
field.description: IN token received when TxFIFO empty mask

field.name: OTEPDM
field.description: OUT token received when endpoint disabled mask

register.name: DVBUSDIS

register.name: DVBUSPULSE
register.description: OTG_FS device VBUS pulsing time register

register.description: OTG_FS device IN endpoint FIFO empty interrupt mask register

field.name: INEPTXFEM
field.description: IN EP Tx FIFO empty interrupt mask bits

register.description: OTG_FS device control IN endpoint 0 control register (OTG_FS_DIEPCTL0)

register.description: OTG_FS device IN endpoint transmit FIFO status register
